column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health issued the daily notice on August 22 announcing that there were no new confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Cambodia yesterday
column4: and 4 more patients have been successfully treated.------The  patients were all Cambodians and returned to Cambodia from the United States and Russia.------As of the morning of August 22
column5: Cambodia had confirmed a total of 273 cases
column6: with 263 recoveries.Â There are 10 active cases still being treated
column8: Cambodia has had no new confirmed cases for 8 consecutive days.------86
